productDescription: The NOVA legging is reversible, you can wear it on both sides. This means two leggings in one! One side is the lighter colour and the other side the darker one. The logoâ€™s on the back and around the ankle are reflectable, which makes the outfit perfect for running or hiking outdoors. The fabric is soft with a high-waisted fit, very comfy.

optionalInfo.fit: The fabric is soft with a high-waisted fit, very comfy.
optionalInfo.care: To protect both your favorite leggings / top and nature, wash at 30 degrees, avoid fabric softener and let it dry flat. Keep your super soft fit by avoiding tree trunks and other rough materials.
optionalInfo.production:
All the garments are produced in a very small-scale factory in Lithuania. the twenty ladies who are working here are paid fairly and earn even 20% more than the EU standard.

The fabric is sustainably produced in Italy, the producer is OEKO-tex 100 certified, energy-neutral by using solar panels and also does water recycling. In addition, they are entitled to the "Zero Discharge Aim", which means that they do not emit harmful chemicals during the production process. Finally, the released CO2 emissions are offset through Trees For All. This organization plans the amount of trees needed to offset CO2 emissions.
